mapper.select: select tsi.ID, ps4.PI_TypeName InvoiceTypeName, tsi.VehicleID, (tsi.SaleNum - tsi.ReturnNum - tsi.RemnantNum -tsi.ScrapNum) SaleNum, tsi.NumberOfSignings as qianNum, e.EPPName, e.EppCode, b.BuilderName, Placing, shortname, tsi.PersonalCode, vm.PersonalName, tsi.Distance, us.empname, SendTime, tsi.StirId, ps.PI_TypeName placeTypeName, VehicleID_Jump jumpVehicleID, (tsi.SaleNum - ReturnNum - RemnantNum -tsi.ScrapNum) SaleNum, ThreeProduceNum, tp.StgId, StoneDia, Slump, ps3.PI_TypeName StoneAsk, ps2.PI_TypeName CementVName, Leave_STTime leaveTime, Arrive_STTime arriveTime, tsi.TaWeight, tsi.GrWeight, tsi.NetWeight, tsi.VehiceNumber, tp.TaskId, tsi.Distance, upStatus, ProduceNum, SaleFileImage, vw.WeightType, it2.PI_TypeName WeightTypeName from PT_TaskSaleInvoice tsi left join PT_TaskPlan tp on tsi.compid = tp.compid and tsi.TaskId = tp.TaskId left join DD_PublicInfo ps on ps.PI_Class = 24 and ps.PI_Values = tp.PlaceStyle and tsi.compid = ps.compid left join SM_EPPInfo e on tp.EPPCode = e.EPPCode and e.compid = tsi.compid left join SM_BuilderInfo b on tp.BuilderCode = b.BuilderCode and b.compid = tsi.compid left join User_employee us on tsi.compid = us.compid and tsi.OpId = us.OpId left join VM_PersonalInfo vm on tsi.PersonalCode = vm.PersonalCode and tsi.compid = vm.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps2 on tp.CementVariety = ps2.PI_Values and ps2.PI_Class = '32' and tsi.compid = ps2.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps3 on tp.StoneAsk = ps3.PI_Values and ps3.PI_Class = '31' and tsi.compid = ps3.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps4 on tsi.compid = ps4.compid and tsi.InvoiceType = ps4.PI_Values and ps4.PI_Class = '51' left join VM_VehicleWeight vw on tsi.compid = vw.compid and tsi.taskid = vw.taskid and tsi.VehicleID = vw.VehicleID and vw.WeightType = 0 and tsi.StirId = vw.StirId left join DD_PublicInfo it2 on it2.PI_Class = 53 and vw.WeightType = it2.PI_Values and tsi.compid = it2.compid where tsi.compid = #{compid} and tsi.id = #{id}
